summary: A mad scientist develops an aftershave lotion that causes his gigantic bats to kill anyone who wears it.
cast: Bela Lugosi|Suzanne Kaaren|Dave O'Brien|Guy Usher|Yolande Donlan|Donald Kerr|Edmund Mortimer|Gene O'Donnell|Alan Baldwin|John Ellis|Arthur Q. Bryan|Hal Price|John Davidson|Billy Griffith|Wally Rairden
title: El murciélago diabólico
